|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTR-241N_V01" and "19K-A05-9000R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board shown below. The '''Asante''' SmartHub AWRT-600N probably shares the same hardware. ==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/airlink101/ar725w AR725W on the OpenWrt wiki] *[http://github.com/leitec/openwrt-leitec Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWRT''' (''openwrt-leitec'')] *[http://staticky.com/ar725w.html '''Airlink101 AR725W Stuff''' @ ''staticky.com''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=400715 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/airlink101/airlink101_ar725w |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/airlink101/ar725w |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt288x |arch = mipsel_mips32r2 |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |image_too_big = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Image build disabled in master with commit d7d46da938e3 }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
